class TensorboardLogger[source]

TensorboardLogger(log_dir:Union[str, Path], name:str, on_step:bool=False)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
logger = TensorboardLogger('log', name='debug')
logger.save_hyperparams({'lr': 0.01})
logger.log({'train/train_loss_1': 0.1, 'epoch': 0})
logger.log({'train/train_loss_1': 0.1})
logger.log({'train/train_loss_1': 0.05})

logger.log({'train/train_loss_1': 0.07, 'epoch': 1})
logger.log({'train/train_loss_1': 0.05, })
logger.log({'train/train_loss_1': 0.05, 'epoch': 2})

logger.close()
{% endraw %}
